rComments: Shelley's core class was really eye opening. Class discussions were awesome, and really contributed to my learning. Browse the reading, do the rewrites and start the research paper early. Make sure to participate in class. Shelley is very fair, and will help you during office hours if you need it.

shelley was awesome! if you skim over the readings for each class you will do fine. she is very enthusiastic about class and makes it interesting. She had one pop quiz but nothing bad. Your grade depends on rewrites, so just re do your essays and you will get an A. Definitely recommend her!

Professor Erickson's a good teacher. She's really clear and especially fair. A lot of the grade depends on rewrites, so if you work hard, it's easy to get an A. She has in class quizzes every day too, but those are easy if you browse the reading due that day.
